title: LRD user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has LRD permission 
AND is creating an individual major contract 
AND is adding a specific clause to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: LRD user composes a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the LRD user has added a clause to the individual contract 
AND has clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form 
AND the user will be able to use the WISYWIG editor to construct custom language using basic formatting such as italics, bolding, underlining, and bullet points.

title: LRD user can copy and paste from MS word into WISYWIG editor- CUSTOM LANGUAGE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WISYWIG editor has appeared for the LRD user from [C63004]
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user copies and pastes text from MS word in to WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN the format of the text from MS word will remain the same and copy/paste is successful

title: CLUB user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has CLUB permission 
AND is creating an individual major contract 
AND is adding a specific clause to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: CLUB user composes a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the CLUB user has added a clause to the individual contract 
AND has clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form 
AND the user will be able to use the WISYWIG editor to construct custom language using basic formatting such as italics, bolding, underlining, and bullet points.

title: CLUB user can copy and paste from MS word into WISYWIG editor- CUSTOM LANGUAGE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WISYWIG editor has appeared for the CLUB user from [C63503]
custom_steps: WHEN the CLUB user copies and pastes text from MS word in to WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN the format of the text from MS word will remain the same and copy/paste is successful

title: LRD user attempts to select stored language that has been superseded
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user wants to select a stored language for a clause or covenant in a Major Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the language dropdown on a clause or covenant
AND attempts to select a language that has an effective date that has been superseded by another effective date
(Ex: a language with an effective date of 4/3/2012 will not display if there is a language with an effective date after 4/3/2012 but before today)
custom_expected: THEN the superseded language will not display as an option

title: CLUB user attempts to select stored language that has been superseded
custom_preconds: GIVEN a CLUB user wants to select a stored language for a clause or covenant in a Major Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the language dropdown on a clause or covenant
AND attempts to select a language that has an effective date that has been superseded by another effective date
(Ex: a language with an effective date of 4/3/2012 will not display if there is a language with an effective date after 4/3/2012 but before today)
custom_expected: THEN the superseded language will not display as an option

title: Stat Batch for Options on MJ Contract (official mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an option on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in official mode
custom_expected: THEN the option or options will be marked as earned and marked official

title: Stat Batch for Performance or other bonuses on MJ Contract (official mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year 
AND a Performance or Other type of Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in official mode
custom_expected: THEN the bonus or bonuses will be marked as earned and marked official

title: Stat Batch for Salary Escalator on MJ Contract (official mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND a salary escalator on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in official mode
custom_expected: THEN the salary escalator(s) will be marked as earned and marked official

title: Stat Batch for Assignment Bonus on MJ Contract (official mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an Assignment Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND the Assignment Bonus has "if earned, mark additional bonuses earned" checked
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in official mode
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment bonus will be marked as earned and marked official
AND all other bonuses specified under the "if earned, marked additional bonuses earned" will be marked as earned and marked official

title: Notification generated if items are marked earned
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Stat Batch has run
custom_steps: WHEN bonuses or escalators are marked earned by the batch
custom_expected: THEN a notification will be generated to the Club Basic and club admin of the signing org and to the LRD Basic and LRD admin

title: Stat Batch for Options on MJ Contract (nightly mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an option on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in nightly mode
custom_expected: THEN the option or options will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Performance or other bonuses on MJ Contract (nightly mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year 
AND a Performance or Other type of Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in nightly mode
custom_expected:
Expected Result
THEN the bonus or bonuses will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Salary Escalator on MJ Contract (nightly mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND a salary escalator on the contract has not been marked official 
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in nightly mode
custom_expected: THEN the salary escalator(s) will be marked as earned

title: Stat Batch for Assignment Bonus on MJ Contract (nightly mode)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MJ Contract is either Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for next Year 
AND an Assignment Bonus on the contract has not been marked official 
AND the Assignment Bonus has "if earned, mark additional bonuses earned" checked
AND has system checked criteria that is met
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract Stat Batch is run in nightly mode
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment bonus will be marked as earned
AND all other bonuses specified under the "if earned, marked additional bonuses earned" will be marked as earned

title: Click Print
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to a contract in View mode or Edit Mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks PRINT button
custom_expected: THEN the user will have the option to print the entire Contract or to print the Contract Terms

title: User Prints Contract Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C63119]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Print Contract terms
custom_expected:
THEN the contract terms for the selected contract will print

Note: Until Printing contract terms has been built, if user sees a new tab that says "Stand in for Contract term" message, then test case passes

title: User Prints Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C63118]
custom_steps: AND has chosen to Print the entire Contract
custom_expected:
THEN the system will generate a pdf using all of the saved data that has been entered into the contract including stored template and languages selected.

Note: Until Printing contract terms has been built, if user sees a new tab that says "Stand in for Contract" message, then test case passes

title: PDF is loading
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C63120]
custom_steps: WHEN the pdf is not generated within a few seconds
custom_expected: THEN the user is made aware that the pdf is loading via a "loading" icon.

title: PDF prints
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed [C63120]
custom_steps: WHEN contract is Preliminary, Terms Submitted, or Terms Confirmed
custom_expected:
THEN the pdf will have a "DRAFT" watermark
Note: Until Printing contract terms has been built, if user sees a new tab that says "Stand in for Contract" message, then test case passes

title: File Management Styling
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user uploads a file

title: Update Status button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating an individual contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the update status button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be presented with all the status options available to choose
